column5: Does anybody use there US debit card in ATM's in Dryden? If so what do thay charge? We use them all the time in the stores. I think we get the best exchange that way but I don't know how the banks charge for there service. Heading for Eagle Lake in 13 hr.Tite linesDennis
We have debit cards for our group they are ok for small purchases I believe they charge 4-5% for foreign charges. Just don't use it for paying the lodge or anything large as the charges can add up.
